description:
godoc: improved output of examples in html.

Fixes issue 2467.
Fixes issue 2464.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Example

, right? (missing /) also, why does .Output get an html but .Code does not?

On 2011/11/30 17:31:31, rsc wrote: > Example

, right? (missing /) Yes. Me stupid. > also, why does .Output get an html but .Code does not? Mmmmh. Code is already html escaped: Happens in cmd/godoc/format.go in FormatText().

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=acdc0b5199be ***

godoc: improved output of examples in html.

Fixes issue 2467.
Fixes issue 2464.

R=golang-dev, rsc, adg
CC=golang-dev
